name: High Marks
description:
An intentionally shitty game made for Game Breaker's Toolkit Jam 2019 and in three hours with three minute game time for Trijam #33.

Controls:

  • Up - Left
  • Down - Right
  • Space - Pee

Sound from: https://freesound.org/people/Adam_N/sounds/346674/

Making Of Stream: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/472268948
